result.eng: Let's say you have a million euro to spend.
result.ga: Abair go bhfuil milliún euro le caitheamh agat
result.orig: Abair go bhfuil milliún euro le caitheamh agat
result.html: Abair go bhfuil milliún euro le caitheamh agatLet's say you have a million euro to spend.
result.ponchtml: Abair go ḃfuil milliún euro le caiṫeaṁ agatLet's say you have a million euro to spend.

result.html: An leor deich euroIs ten euro enough?
result.ponchtml: An leor deiċ euroIs ten euro enough?

result.html: Chosain sé ceithre euro ormIt cost me four euro.
result.ponchtml: Ċosain sé ceiṫre euro ormIt cost me four euro.

result.eng: I payed a half a thousand euro for this bicycle.
result.ga: Dhíol mé leathmhíle euro as an rothar seo
result.orig: Dhíol mé leathmhíle euro as an rothar seo
result.html: Dhíol mé leathmhíle euro as an rothar seoI payed a half a thousand euro for this bicycle.
result.ponchtml: Ḋíol mé leaṫṁíle euro as an roṫar seoI payed a half a thousand euro for this bicycle.

result.html: D'íoc muid 300 euroWe paid 300 euro.

result.html: D'íoc mé 20 euro leoI paid them 20 euro.

result.html: Is fiú tríocha euro éIt is worth thirty euro.
result.ponchtml: Is fiú tríoċa euro éIt is worth thirty euro.

result.eng: I only have five euro left.

result.html: Níl ach cúig euro fágtha agamI only have five euro left.
result.ponchtml: Níl aċ cúig euro fágṫa agamI only have five euro left.

result.html: Níl agam ach deich euroI only have ten euro.
result.ponchtml: Níl agam aċ deiċ euroI only have ten euro.

result.eng: I have spent the twenty euro.

result.ponchtml: Tá an fiċe euro caite agamI have spent the twenty euro.

result.html: Tá deich euro agat ormI owe you ten euro.
result.ponchtml: Tá deiċ euro agat ormI owe you ten euro.

result.eng: One hundred euro per person per week.
